mapper.select: select b.*, a.*, c.reviewNo, c.reviewContent, c.reviewStar, d.profileImg, d.nickname from sapareItem a left outer join sapareOrder b on a.itemId = b.itemId left outer join sapareReview c on b.orderId = c.orderId left outer join sapareMember d on b.memberName = d.memberName where b.memberName=#{memberName} order by b.orderDate desc

select b.*, a.*, c.reviewNo, c.reviewContent, c.reviewStar, d.profileImg, d.nickname from sapareItem a left outer join sapareOrder b on a.itemId = b.itemId left outer join sapareReview c on b.orderId = c.orderId left outer join sapareMember d on b.memberName = d.memberName where b.memberName=#{memberName} and trunc(a.itemUploadDate) BETWEEN trunc(sysdate-7) and trunc(sysdate) order by b.orderDate desc

select b.*, a.*, c.reviewNo, c.reviewContent, c.reviewStar, d.profileImg, d.nickname from sapareItem a left outer join sapareOrder b on a.itemId = b.itemId left outer join sapareReview c on b.orderId = c.orderId left outer join sapareMember d on b.memberName = d.memberName where b.memberName=#{memberName} and trunc(a.itemUploadDate) BETWEEN trunc(sysdate-30) and trunc(sysdate) order by b.orderDate desc

select b.*, a.*, c.reviewNo, c.reviewContent, c.reviewStar, d.profileImg, d.nickname from sapareItem a left outer join sapareOrder b on a.itemId = b.itemId left outer join sapareReview c on b.orderId = c.orderId left outer join sapareMember d on b.memberName = d.memberName where b.memberName=#{memberName} and trunc(a.itemUploadDate) BETWEEN trunc(sysdate-180) and trunc(sysdate) order by b.orderDate desc

select z.* from (select b.*, a.itemprice,a.itemabout,a.itemviewcnt,a.itemname,a.itemimagepath,a.itemstatus,a.itemuploaddate, a.itemtype,a.itemwantcnt,a.itemflagcnt, c.reviewNo, c.reviewContent, c.reviewStar, d.profileImg, d.nickname from sapareItem a left outer join sapareOrder b on a.itemId = b.itemId left outer join sapareReview c on b.orderId = c.orderId left outer join sapareMember d on b.memberName = d.memberName where b.memberName=#{memberName} order by b.orderDate desc) z where lower(itemname) like lower('%'||#{searchWord}||'%') or lower(itemabout) like lower('%'||#{searchWord}||'%') or lower(sellername) like lower('%'||#{searchWord}||'%') or lower(orderprice) like lower('%'||#{searchWord}||'%') order by orderdate desc
